original_text: At this time there are three things that continue. We continue to trust God. We continue to hope for his good things. We continue to love other people. But the most important of these things is love.
korean_text: 그런즉 믿음, 소망, 사랑, 이 세 가지는 항상 있을 것인데 그 중의 제일은 사랑이라

sentences.original_text: At this time there are three things that continue.
We continue to hope for his good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그의 좋은 것들을 계속 바랍니다.

sentences.original_text: We continue to love other people.
But the most important of these things is love.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이것들 중 가장 중요한 것은 사랑입니다.
